title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When attempting to use the 'Close all saved' function, it does not always close the file as intended. There seems to be inconsistency in its behavior.
OB: When using the 'Close all saved' function, it should close all the saved files without making any changes to them.
EB: When using the 'Close all saved' function, it is not closing all the saved files. Instead, it is either not closing any files or closing only some of them. This is not the expected behavior.
SR: To resolve this issue, please investigate and fix the 'Close all saved' function to ensure it consistently closes all the saved files without making any changes to them.
